name: (WIP)Shape Hotel
description:
Been Quite A While Since I Released A Game Wasent It?

Anyway,So This Is Shape Hotel,Its In Open Beta So Everything is Subject To Change And Expect A Few Bugs.

This Is Also My First Attempt At A Story So If Its Too Simple For You, Just Only Mind The Gameplay.

Also,At The Moment-This Is Only A x86 Windows Build However Exept More When It Gets Released!
